Replace.Text: Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Each round consumes [ICON_Science] technology value, and a free technology will be randomly awarded upon completion.
Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Each round consumes [ICON_Culture] culture value, and a free municipal reward will be randomly awarded upon completion.
Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Each round consumes [ICON_Science] technology value, and upon completion, two random technologies will activate [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka.
Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Each round consumes [ICON_Culture] cultural value, and upon completion, activates [ICON_CivicBoosted] apocalypse for two random municipalities.
[NEWLINE] Build a city on the current cell and convert adjacent ocean cells into coastal cells
[NEWLINE][COLOR:Red] is too close to other cities[ENDCOLOR]
[NEWLINE][COLOR:Red]Cannot build a city on a lake[ENDCOLOR]
[NEWLINE][COLOR:Red]Cannot build a city in a natural wonder[ENDCOLOR]

Featured merchant unit. [NEWLINE]Ability to create and maintain an [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route. Automatically build roads and acquire cells as your journey progresses. [NEWLINE][ICON_TradeRoute]Trade routes cannot be looted by enemy units. When entering an unowned cell within 5 cells of the city, the cell will be included in your territory.
[ICON_TradeRoute]Trade routes cannot be looted by enemy units. When entering an unowned cell within 5 cells of the city, the cell will be included in your territory.
Adjacent enemy units have -1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Neighboring enemy cities lose -1 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty each round.
The unit's [ICON_Strength] combat strength increases or decreases with the charm of the cell it is in.
+{Amount} comes from the charm of the cell where it is located
+{Property}comes from the dead barbarians around you
It will not suffer combat effectiveness debuffs after being injured, can resist large-scale anti-personnel weapons, and can move after attacking.
The [ICON_Strength] combat strength of units changes with the times.
+7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting more advanced units.
This unit does not consume strategic resources when created or maintained.
+40 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending against giant killing robots
+40[ICON_Strength] combat strength from defending against giant killing robots
+5 [ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness in hilly terrain, woods, and rainforest terrain.
+{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] Combat strength comes from the jungle
+{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] Combat strength comes from the woods
When starting from the river, [ICON_Movement] movement +1.

Date A Live featured area, replacing the Town Square. [NEWLINE]The area used to commemorate the choice of a civilized government can only be built once. This city provides +8 loyalty each turn, and all adjacent areas provide +1 adjacency bonus. Reward 1 [Icon_Governor] chief executive title. [NEWLINE][COLOR:Civ6Blue]Some elves can activate optional abilities here. [ENDCOLOR]
+{1_num}[ICON_Gold] gold coins come from adjacent farmland.
+{1_num}[ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent fishing boats.

Witch-specific projects can increase the loyalty pressure this city spreads to itself and surrounding cities. [NEWLINE]When activated, each [ICON_Citizen] citizen gets +3 loyalty pressure per turn for this city. This effect will also affect other cities within a 9-cell range, but the effect will be reduced by 10% for every other cell. After the project is completed, the loyalty of the [ICON_Loyalty] and the nearby [ICON_Loyalty] will increase. The loyalty of the foreign city [ICON_Loyalty] will decrease (decrease according to the distance).
Witch special items. Upon completion, the capital of [ICON_Capital] will be moved to this city.

Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Randomly produce 1-3 unique units from the civilizations you encounter (only units with unlocked technology or municipal requirements). Units older than the past two epochs will not be generated. [NEWLINE]The army you recruit has a certain chance of changing.

Bunny girl special project. [NEWLINE] Each round consumes [ICON_Faith] faith value, and after completion, a random [ICON_Religion] religious faith that has not yet been obtained will be provided. [NEWLINE] If Pantheon belief has not been obtained, a random Pantheon belief will be automatically obtained; if a religion has not been created yet, a random religion will be created.
Transform the current cell into a hilly cell. [NEWLINE]Only mountains that are not volcanoes can be converted.
Convert the current cell to a plain cell. [NEWLINE]Only lakes and coasts without resources can be converted.
Convert the current cell and adjacent cells to plain cells. [NEWLINE]Only lakes, coasts, and oceans without resources can be transformed.

Date A Live Swimsuit Elf features improved facilities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Constructed by military engineers or naval units. When an enemy unit steps into its cell, it will suffer 50 points of damage. Can be built on oceans or coasts, lakes and reefs.

Date A Live Kimono Elf features improved facilities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Culture] culture value. +1 Charisma. If it is adjacent to other segments or adjacent to wonders and natural wonders, you can get the [ICON_Faith] faith value bonus. If the adjacent forest +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value. With the advancement of science and technology, it provides [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance equal to the output of [ICON_Faith] faith value.
Building a city on the sea
+{1_num}[ICON_Science]The science and technology value comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_Culture]The cultural value comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_Production] Productivity comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_Faith]The faith value comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_GFOOD]Food comes from the city in the sea.
+{1_num}[ICON_Gold] gold coins come from the city in the sea.

Date A Live featured buildings. [NEWLINE]Land units can cross without boarding a ship. Acts like a modern road and will build modern roads on the land tiles at both ends if they are not already built. Adjacent cells have +1 Charisma. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on coast tiles. The bridge must cross the cell between two land cells and lead directly to the other side. There must be at least one water cell to the left and right of the bridge.

Date A Live featured buildings. [NEWLINE]When completed, 1 or 2 adjacent canal areas will automatically be built. The [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route passing here can obtain multiple gold coins from its destination area. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on plain tiles, adjacent tiles must be facing each other across building tiles, and meet the following criteria: One of the adjacent tiles must have a building tile connected to the Panama Canal canal area; the other cell must be a city, a water cell, or have another connected canal cell.

Date A Live featured area, replacing the canal. [NEWLINE]An area that connects two major bodies of water or connects a body of water to a city center. The [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route passing here can obtain multiple gold coins from its destination area. [NEWLINE]Canals can pass directly through tiles, or they can curve at 60 degrees. Canal junctions with three entrances and exits cannot be built, however, and canals must have a full land tile on each side of the waterway they create. Military engineers can spend 1 use point to complete 20% of the canal construction progress.

Date A Live featured area, replacing the dam. [NEWLINE]Area built along a river to improve the comfort of residents along the river. Avoids flooding damage on this river (although benefits from flooding are halved). Avoid [ICON_Food] food loss during drought. [NEWLINE]The river must cross at least two sides of the dam tile. Military engineers can spend 1 use point to complete 20% of the canal construction progress.
+{1_num}[ICON_Science] Science value comes from adjacent city centers.
+{1_num}[ICON_Gold] gold coins come from adjacent city centers.
+{1_num}[ICON_Culture] Culture value comes from adjacent city center.
+{1_num}[ICON_Faith] Faith value comes from adjacent city center.

Gold is the earliest metal discovered and utilized by humans. Because gold is rare, special and precious, it is known as the "King of Metals" and enjoys a reputation unmatched by other metal varieties. Its prominent status is almost eternal. Precisely because of its "noble" status, gold was once a symbol of wealth and luxury. With the development of society, the economic status and application level of gold are constantly changing, but it still occupies a place in the international reserves of various countries. It is a special commodity that has monetary attributes, commodity attributes and financial attributes at the same time.
[ICON_RESOURCE_GOLD] Based on gold resources, we create new products for the world. {LOC_INDUSTRY_GOLD_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Commonly known as platinum, it is a very inactive metal. Even at high temperatures, it has strong corrosion resistance and is a corrosion-resistant metal. In nature, platinum sometimes occurs as a pure metal, uncombined with other elements. Platinum occurs naturally in the alluvium of rivers, so pre-Columbian South American natives were the first to use platinum to make crafts. The use of platinum was first recorded in Europe in the 16th century; in 1748, Antonio Ulloa published a report describing this new metal from Colombia, and scientists began to study the element platinum at this time.
[ICON_RESOURCE_PLATINUM] Based on platinum resources, we create new products for the world. {LOC_INDUSTRY_GOLD_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Cherry blossoms originated in the Himalayas millions of years ago, and then spread to other areas in the northern temperate zone. Around the Oligocene and Miocene epochs, one of them passed through eastern China and reached the Korean Peninsula and the Japanese Islands. Therefore, cherry blossoms are a common species in East Asia such as China, North Korea, South Korea and Japan. The fruits of some varieties of cherry blossoms are not edible due to their poor taste, but they can be used to propagate cherry blossom trees. They can bear fruit on flat ground in temperate areas, while in subtropical areas the altitude needs to be higher than 500 meters. Many of the cherry blossoms currently used for viewing are not wild species but cultivated varieties. Due to the variable nature of cherry blossoms, many cultivars have been created specifically for cherry blossom viewing, which is more common in Japan. Since the Heian period, the Japanese have developed many cultivated varieties by selecting superior or mutated individuals generated by natural or artificial hybridization of wild cherry blossoms, grafting and cuttings.
[ICON_RESOURCE_SAKURA] Based on Sakura resources, we create new products for the world. {LOC_INDUSTRY_CULTURE_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Shark fin is derived from shark fins and is one of the most precious ingredients in Chinese cuisine. It has a long history of consumption. According to reports, during the Tang and Song Dynasties of China, shark fins began to be made into food in the coastal areas of Vietnam. Some countries once offered shark fins as tribute to the Chinese royal family. It is also said that shark fins were eaten by the Chinese during Zheng He's voyages to the West. The sailors picked up shark fins and cooked them on Southeast Asian islands to satisfy their hunger. One theory is that Zheng Zhilong, the father of Zheng Chenggong, invented it while living at sea, made a commodity and got rich, and got his eldest son Zheng Chenggong back from Japan.
[ICON_RESOURCE_SHARKS] Based on shark fin resources, we create new products for the world. {LOC_INDUSTRY_GOLD_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Aquamarine, also known as sea sapphire, is a silicate mineral and a type of beryl. It is a transparent and blue or aquamarine gemstone. During the Middle Ages, aquamarine was believed to have a miraculous ability to overcome the effects of poisons. Ancient sailors would wear aquamarine when sailing, believing that it would ensure the safety of the voyage and ensure their safe return; when sleeping, they would place the gemstone under their pillows to ensure adequate sleep. They believed that the mermaid's fish-shaped lower body was made of aquamarine.
[ICON_RESOURCE_AQUAMARINE] Based on aquamarine resources, we create new products for the world. {LOC_INDUSTRY_GOLD_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Ruby, a gem-grade corundum, has traditionally been used as one of the most important gemstones to make religious ritual items and royal jewelry. The main component of ruby ​​is aluminum oxide, and its red color comes from chromium. A naturally occurring gemstone without chromium is blue sapphire. Natural rubies mostly come from Asia (Myanmar, Thailand and Sri Lanka), Africa and Australia, and are also partially produced in Montana and South Carolina in the United States. Natural rubies are very rare and precious, but artificial rubies are not too difficult, so industrial rubies are all artificial.
[ICON_RESOURCE_RUBY] Create new products for the world based on ruby ​​resources. {LOC_INDUSTRY_GOLD_YIELD_BONUS_DESCRIPTION}

Cacti are succulent plants that can grow in deserts. They have the ability to store water and tolerate drought, and can provide some food and gold income. Cactus is also a beautiful and unique decoration that can increase people's satisfaction and inspire cultural and technological innovation in desert cities.

Bamboo, also known as bamboo, is a plant belonging to the subfamily Bambusoideae of the family Poaceae. It comes in many different varieties and forms and is one of the fastest growing plants in the world. Bamboo has important meanings and uses in many cultures as food, building materials, crafts, paper, textiles, and more.

The characteristic heavy cavalry unit that accompanies Bamboo. Vision and movement are not affected by forests and rainforests. Each Bamboo Lumber Camp provides Iron Eaters with +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE]If the damage points are higher than the opponent's, the defending enemy unit will be pushed to the rear cell. If the defending unit cannot retreat, it will suffer additional damage.
Vision and movement are not affected by forests and rainforests. Each Bamboo Lumber Camp provides Iron Eaters with +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
A lake formed by water accumulating in the crater after a volcano erupts is a type of volcanic lake. Provide fresh water resources.
Meet the cheongsam leader in his unique palace. +1 general policy slot.
